item.title: Right-click duel
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

[quote=“noobsauce, post:4, topic:306102”]public boolean isinDuel() {
if((absX >= 3379 && absX <= 3355 && absY >= 3279 && absY <= 3272))
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3); // -dead fury
outStream.writeByteA(1);
outStream.writeString(“Duel”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
return true;
else
return false;
}
}

try that?if it doesnt work idk what to do you could send me ur source and i could fix it maybe[/quote]
I get 100 errors when i do that.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2009, 06:50:30 pm[/size][hr]now i did this and got no errors

public boolean isinDuel() { if((absX >= 3379 && absX <= 3355 && absY >= 3279 && absY <= 3272)) { { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // -dead fury outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeString("Duel"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } return true; } return false; }

but when i right-click someone both ppls clients freeze

item.title: Right-click duel
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

Well i have this code in my client.java. I based it off someother isinArea booleans and used my code for making attack only show up in wildy. This is my code

public boolean isinDuel() { if((absX >= 3379 && absX <= 3355 && absY >= 3279 && absY <= 3272)) outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // -dead fury outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeString("Duel"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); return true; else return false; }

But I get this error.

client.java:4556: 'else' without 'if' else ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
what do i need to change?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2009, 06:02:17 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic
